titleStmt.title: The Scotch souldiers lamentation upon the death of the most glorious and illustrious martyr, King Charles. Shewing, that the authors thereof have out-done all, even Korah, Dathan and Abiram, in rebellion. And himselfe went likewise beyond all, but our blessed Saviour whom he imitated, in his sufferings. To which is annexed, An elegy on the death of that much to be bewailed Prince.

notesStmt.note: "An elegy upon the death of the most glorious, and illustrious martyr, King Charles", in verse, is on final 2 leaves.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
